title: Independent MPs, SLFP to support SJB no confidence motion
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP), its 11 affiliated parties alongside the Independent MPs have agreed to support the No Confidence Motion brought forward by the Samagi Jana Balawegaya, says the SLFP General Secretary, Dayasiri Jayasekara.
Red alert issued for likely cyclonic storm over Bay of Bengal
